name: Liandry's Torment
simpleDescription: Charge up in combat to deal high damage over time, especially against durable enemies

passives.name: Torment
passives.effects: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take 1% of the target's maximum health magic damage every 0.5s seconds over 3 seconds, capped at 20 per tick against monsters. (6% of the target's maximum health total magic damage over 3 seconds, capped at 120 against monsters.)

passives.name: Suffering
passives.effects: For each second in combat with enemy champions, deal 2% increased damage, stacking up to 3 times for a total of 6%.
